elements.correctAnswer: With cash, book money or money substitutes.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: How can I make a partial cash payment?
elements.correctAnswer: If only one of the two business partners has an account with the post office or a bank, either the debtor pays cash into the creditor's account at the post office or bank counter or the debtor transfers the amount owed from his account, which is paid to the creditor in cash.
